评论详情: Very happy with this product. I love how well it tied my look together. It is mid in weight. Light enough that it isn’t annoy, but also solid in quality. I also liked the packaging. Highly recommend! -Tahja ✨ (IG: @ItsTahja)

Super cute, but after 1 day of running errands and hanging with friends, noticed a lot of the spikes were missing. Guess they got caught in the car, or sitting, or playing with cat. Easy enough to repair, but could have been made more study.
